results.title: Front Runner Easy-Out Awning 2 Metre for Vehicle Expedition, Camping Overland Use (SUV, 4WD, Travel) RoadTrip Adventure
results.description:
Always have shelter from the elements with this Easy-Out Awning / 2m, which mounts to your roof rack. When expanded, this awning measures 2m wide and 2.1m out from the vehicle, making it an ideal size for all medium vehicles.

Quick and easy two-person set up, in under 60 seconds.
Mounts quickly and easily to the side of your Front Runner Roof Rack for instant sun or rain protection.
Water-repellent, UV-resistant awning measures 2m wide and extends 2.1m from mounting extrusion.
Lightweight, yet durable, vertical support poles have spikes on the end for secure ground placement and extend to 2.4m maximum height for use with taller vehicles.
Telescopic aluminium twist-lock upright and rafter poles as well as aluminium rafters that ensure rigidity.
Includes reflective gut ropes with tent stakes for stability in windy conditions.
Durable, heavy-duty PVC coated 650g nylon cover protects your awning while stowed and in transit.
Universal mounting hardware included. For best mounting results on Front Runner Racks, upgrade to the Quick Release Awning Mount Kit or Easy-Out Awning Brackets.
Add additional sun/rain protection to the front or side with Wind/Sun Break for 2M Awning / Front or Wind/Sun Break for 1.4M/2M & 2.5M Awning / Side.
Turn any awning into a shelter in minutes by adding the Easy-Out Awning Room / 2M or Easy-Out Awning Mosquito Net / 2M.
Folds into the main carry bag which can be left permanently attached to the vehicle.
Use the 3 mounting loops to secure the LED Light Strip / 1.2M to illuminate the space under the awning.
Consists of:
1 x Awning with adjustable hortizontal & verticle support poles
1 x Mounting plate with zippered heavy-duty storage bag
2 x Tent stakes
Guy Ropes

Materials used:
Awning: 400d oxford/polyester ripstop, UV-resistant (UVP 50+), PU-coated 1500mm water-repellant
Awning Bag: Heavy-duty 650g PVC-coated nylon

Product Dimensions:
Closed:
2040mm (80") L x 100mm (4") W x 100mm (4") H

Open:
2100mm (82.7") L x 2000mm (78.7") W x 2400mm (94.5") H (Max Height)

Weight:
12.5kg (27.6lbs)

results.description:

Feature:
1. Dual Light Source: Near and far dual light sources, suitable for different needs.
2. Anti Slip Texture: Increase friction and prevent flashlight from falling off.
3. Emergency Power Supply: The flashlight using AAA batteries may not support the emergency power function, while it using 18650 and 26650 batteries support the emergency power function.
4. Low Battery Reminder: The switch position indicator flashes red when charging, and the switch position indicator always lights green when fully charged and in use.
5. Satisfaction Guarantee: We strive to provide each customer with the highest standard of customer service to ensure you have a pleasant shopping experience. If you have any issues, inquiries or need assistance, please feel free to contact us directly.

Product size: 175x43x43mm/6.88x1.69x1.69inch

results.title: Kate Spade Stationery Insulated Tumbler with Reusable Straw Acrylic Travel Cup with Lid - Adventure Stripe
results.description:
‚Ä¢ Tumbler with straw holds 24 ounces and features a double wall design that keeps drinks cool and the cup free of condensation.
‚Ä¢ Tumbler cup features a slim design that is easy to carry and fits in most standard cupholders. The lock-tight lid easily screws on/off and includes a reusable straw that won't break.
‚Ä¢ The 3-inch (7.62 cm) opening allows for hassle-free cleaning and makes it easy to fill. For best care, the insulated tumbler cannot be used in the microwave and should be washed by hand.
‚Ä¢ Insulated cup is made of BPA-, lead-, and phthalate-free acrylic so your drink is rid of any harsh chemicals. The non-toxic tumbler can be refilled and reused endlessly to help reduce plastic waste.
‚Ä¢ 24oz tumbler is featured in a fun striped design with a solid pink lid and straw. The Kate Spade New York logo is printed in shiny gold lettering near the base.

results.title: Quick Pitch Roof Top Tent Quickpitch for Vehicle Expedition, Camping Overland Use (SUV, 4WD, Travel) RoadTrip Adventure
results.description:
Our "Quick pitch roof top tent" works in a similar way to the hard shell tent as it pops open on gas lifts but rather than having a metal outer shell it has a zipped canvas top cover which stays attached to the tent when opened.  The tent has an aluminium base and hinged lifting frame.

The motivation for developing the Quick pitch tent was to try and produce a tent that was lighter and cheaper than the hard shell tent but still be quick and easy to use.

Information:

2.2m L x 1.3m W quick pitch roof top tent

Easy self opening tent working on gas assisted springs

3 x Doors/openings on the ripstop canvas with built in mosquito nets

Double skinned ripstop canvas roof

Upholstered 75mm high density foam mattress

Alumiumium Ladder

Shade/weather awning complete with spring rods

2 x Telescopic aluminium tensioning poles

Weight +/- 50kg's

results.title: SL| Kids Visor Hat with Fan Protection Wide Brim for Outdoor Adventures Summer Hiking Travel and Screen Accessories
results.description:
Description: 

Our kids visor hat, a must-have for your little ones!

This hat is the epitome of comfort and functionality, making it perfect for all their outdoor adventures.

Not only does this visor hat protect your child from the harsh rays, but it also keeps them cool with its unique small fan design.

Say goodbye to sweaty foreheads and hello to a refreshing breeze!

.

This hat is not only practical but also incredibly convenient.

It is lightweight and portable, easily rolling into a compact size that can fit into any purse, backpack, or handbag.

No more worrying about bulky accessories weighing you down.

The wide brim of this visor hat provides excellent uv protection, ensuring your child's delicate skin is shielded from harmful rays.

The breathable and open-top design keeps their head cool even in scorching hot weather, guaranteeing maximum comfort.

Perfect for any outdoor activity, this dual-function hat offers the best of both worlds  a fan and a hat.

Adjust the three-speed to your child's liking, allowing them to customize their comfort according to their needs.

To make life even easier, this fan hat comes with a usb charging function, ensuring that it can be easily charged anytime, anywhere.

No more fussing over batteries or finding a power source.

Convenience at its finest.

With an adjustable head circumference of 46-52cm, this visor hat comfortably fits both children and adults.

It's perfect for family trips or even when your child wants to share their stylish accessory with you.

Carrying and using this hat is a breeze.

It is designed to be user-friendly, making it the ideal accessory for outdoor travel, beach visits, mountain climbing, cycling, hiking, and any other adventure your child embarks on.

Upgrade your child's outdoor experience with our kids visor hat.

Comfort, style, and functionality all rolled into one amazing product.

Don't miss out on this must-have accessory for your little ones!
Item Name: Kids Visor Hat
Material: Polyester
Usage: Sun Protection
Features: with Fan, Adjustable, Wide Brim

results.description: Simplify your travels with our functional and stylish travel bag. Made with tear-resistant fabric and waterproof material, it's designed to keep your belongings safe and secure. The large capacity and multiple pocket design offer ample storage space, while the padded straps and handles provide comfort on the move. With its sleek and modern design, it's a perfect choice for the discerning traveler.
